00009 /*
00010  *  util_print_time -- massage a long which represents a time interval in
00011  *  milliseconds, into a string suitable for output 
00012  *
00013  *  Hack for IBM/PC -- avoids using floating point
00014  */

00016 char *
00017 util_print_time(unsigned long t)
00018 {
00019     static char s[40];
00020 
00021     (void) sprintf(s, "%ld.%02ld sec", t/1000, (t%1000)/10);
00022     return s;
00023 }
